TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FilterEventHandler(object sender, FilterEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed FilterEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub FilterEventHandler(sender As Object, e As FilterEventArgs)
public delegate void FilterEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, FilterEventArgs ^ e);

summary.span: 表示用来处理 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows how to set an event handler for the event. 在此示例中，`listingDataView`是的一个实例。In this example, `listingDataView` is an instance of . [!code-csharp[DataBindingLab#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#10)] [!code-vb[DataBindingLab#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/VisualBasic/MainWindow.xaml.vb#10)] 下面的示例演示的示例实现`ShowOnlyBargainsFilter`筛选器事件处理程序。The following example shows the implementation of the example `ShowOnlyBargainsFilter` filter event handler. 此事件处理程序使用属性筛选掉`AuctionItem`对象具有`CurrentPrice`为 $25.00 或更高版本。This event handler uses the property to filter out `AuctionItem` objects that have a `CurrentPrice` of $25.00 or greater. [!code-csharp[DataBindingLab#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DataBindingLab#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/VisualBasic/MainWindow.xaml.vb#5)] 有关完整示例，请参阅[数据绑定演示](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete example, see [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).
